tendsto_of_monotone:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print tendsto_of_monotone /-
theorem tendsto_of_monotone {ι α : Type _} [preorder ι] [TopologicalSpace α] [ConditionallyCompleteLinearOrder α]
    [OrderTopology α] {f : ι → α} (h_mono : Monotone f) : Tendsto f atTop atTop ∨ ∃ l, Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) l) :=
  if H : BddAbove (range f) then or.inr ⟨_, tendsto_atTop_csupᵢ h_mono H⟩
  else or.inl <| tendsto_atTop_atTop_of_monotone' h_mono H
#align tendsto_of_monotone tendsto_of_monotone
-/
tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone /-
theorem tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone {ι₁ ι₂ α : Type _} [SemilatticeSup ι₁] [preorder ι₂] [Nonempty ι₁]
    [TopologicalSpace α] [ConditionallyCompleteLinearOrder α] [OrderTopology α] [NoMaxOrder α] {f : ι₂ → α}
    {φ : ι₁ → ι₂} {l : α} (hf : Monotone f) (hg : Tendsto φ atTop atTop) :
    Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) l) ↔ Tendsto (f ∘ φ) atTop ((nhds) l) :=
  by
  constructor <;> intro h
  · exact h.comp hg
  · rcases tendsto_of_monotone hf with (h' | ⟨l', hl'⟩)
    · exact (not_tendsto_atTop_of_tendsto_nhds h (h'.comp hg)).elim
    · rwa [tendsto_nhds_unique h (hl'.comp hg)]
#align tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone tendsto_iff_tendsto_subseq_of_monotone
-/

#print tendsto_atTop_supᵢ /-
theorem tendsto_atTop_supᵢ (h_mono : Monotone f) :
    Tendsto f atTop
      ((nhds)
        («expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f i))) :=
  tendsto_atTop_csupᵢ h_mono (OrderTop.bddAbove _)
#align tendsto_at_top_supr tendsto_atTop_supᵢ
-/
tendsto_atTop_isLUB:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print tendsto_atTop_isLUB /-
/-

-- see Note [lower instance priority]
-- see Note [lower instance priority]
theorem tendsto_atTop_isLUB (h_mono : Monotone f) (ha : IsLUB (Set.range f) a) : Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) a) :=
  by
  suffices : tendsto (range_factorization f) at_top at_top
  exact (Sup_convergence_class.tendsto_coe_at_top_is_lub _ _ ha).comp this
  exact h_mono.range_factorization.tendsto_at_top_at_top fun b => b.2.imp fun a ha => ha.ge
#align tendsto_at_top_is_lub tendsto_atTop_isLUB
-/
tendsto_atTop_isGLB:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print tendsto_atTop_isGLB /-
theorem tendsto_atTop_isGLB (h_anti : Antitone f) (ha : IsGLB (Set.range f) a) : Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) a) := by
  convert tendsto_atBot_isLUB h_anti.dual ha.dual
#align tendsto_at_top_is_glb tendsto_atTop_isGLB
-/

      ((nhds)
        («expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f i))) :=

supᵢ_eq_supᵢ_subseq_of_monotone:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
#print supᵢ_eq_supᵢ_subseq_of_monotone /-
theorem supᵢ_eq_supᵢ_subseq_of_monotone {ι₁ ι₂ α : Type _} [preorder ι₂] [CompleteLattice α] {l : Filter ι₁} [l.ne_bot]
    {f : ι₂ → α} {φ : ι₁ → ι₂} (hf : Monotone f) (hφ : Tendsto φ l atTop) :
    «expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f i) =
      «expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (f (φ i)) :=
  le_antisymm
    (supᵢ_mono' fun i => Exists.imp (fun j (hj : i ≤ φ j) => hf hj) (hφ.eventually <| eventually_ge_atTop i).exists)
    (supᵢ_mono' fun i => ⟨φ i, le_rfl⟩)
#align supr_eq_supr_subseq_of_monotone supᵢ_eq_supᵢ_subseq_of_monotone
-/
supᵢ_eq_of_tendsto:

#print supᵢ_eq_of_tendsto /-
theorem supᵢ_eq_of_tendsto {α β} [TopologicalSpace α] [CompleteLinearOrder α] [OrderTopology α] [Nonempty β]
    [SemilatticeSup β] {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : Monotone f) : Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) a) → supᵢ f = a :=
  tendsto_nhds_unique (tendsto_atTop_supᵢ hf)
#align supr_eq_of_tendsto supᵢ_eq_of_tendsto
-/
le_of_tendsto:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print Antitone.le_of_tendsto /-
theorem Antitone.le_of_tendsto [TopologicalSpace α] [preorder α] [OrderClosedTopology α] [SemilatticeSup β] {f : β → α}
    {a : α} (hf : Antitone f) (ha : Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) a)) (b : β) : a ≤ f b :=
  hf.dual_right.ge_of_tendsto ha b
#align antitone.le_of_tendsto Antitone.le_of_tendsto
-/
isLUB_of_tendsto_atTop:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print isLUB_of_tendsto_atTop /-
theorem isLUB_of_tendsto_atTop [TopologicalSpace α] [preorder α] [OrderClosedTopology α] [Nonempty β] [SemilatticeSup β]
    {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : Monotone f) (ha : Tendsto f atTop ((nhds) a)) : IsLUB (Set.range f) a :=
  by
  constructor
  · rintro _ ⟨b, rfl⟩
    exact hf.ge_of_tendsto ha b
  · exact fun _ hb => le_of_tendsto' ha fun x => hb (Set.mem_range_self x)
#align is_lub_of_tendsto_at_top isLUB_of_tendsto_atTop
-/

    {f : β → α} {a : α} (hf : Antitone f) (ha : Tendsto f atBot ((nhds) a)) : IsLUB (Set.range f) a :=
  @isLUB_of_tendsto_atTop α («expr ᵒᵈ» β) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ hf.dual_left ha
#align is_lub_of_tendsto_at_bot isLUB_of_tendsto_atBot
-/

ge_of_tendsto:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
#print Antitone.ge_of_tendsto /-
theorem Antitone.ge_of_tendsto [TopologicalSpace α] [preorder α] [OrderClosedTopology α] [SemilatticeInf β] {f : β → α}
    {a : α} (hf : Antitone f) (ha : Tendsto f atBot ((nhds) a)) (b : β) : f b ≤ a :=
